<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="ValidatedUsernameNode" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="org/forgerock/openam/auth/nodes/ValidatedUsernameNode"  i18nKey="nodeDescription"  resourceName="ValidatedUsernameNode"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/ValidatedUsernameNode" ><Organization><SubSchema i18nKey="nodeDescription"  inheritance="multiple"  name="instance"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  validate="yes" ><AttributeSchema i18nKey="validateInput"  name="validateInput"  order="100"  resourceName="validateInput"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>false</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="usernameAttribute"  name="usernameAttribute"  order="300"  resourceName="usernameAttribute"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>userName</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="objectType"  name="objectType"  order="200"  resourceName="objectType"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>user</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="RequiredValueValidator0"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema></SubSchema></Organization></Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
